word: And the transformation having taken place through the leaven of truth, a work is entrusted to us. Christ commissions us, "All power is given unto Me in heaven and in earth. Go ye therefore, and teach all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost: teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world."--Ms 82, 1898 (MR 900.49).
